title: U.K. Police Detain Two in Probe Into Texas Hostage Taker
sub_head: Malik Faisal Akram died after taking four hostage at Texas synagogue
body:
LONDONâ€”U.K. authorities detained two people in a probe into the British man who took four worshippers hostage at a Texas synagogue, as they work with U.S. authorities to determine his movements and motive.
The two men were arrested Thursday morning in the U.K. cities of Birmingham and Manchester, according to a statement from counterterror police, which added that they remained in custody for questioning.
